title: Breakingviews TV - Trump drug dump
text:
Breakingviews TV - Trump drug dump 6:19pm BST - 03:22
The president has unveiled long-promised plans to bring down the price of prescription medication. Antony Currie and Robert Cyran explain how it’s far more of a sop to the pharma industry than a salve for overcharged consumers.
The president has unveiled long-promised plans to bring down the price of prescription medication. Antony Currie and Robert Cyran explain how it’s far more of a sop to the pharma industry than a salve for overcharged consumers. //reut.rs/2L0jf9o
